Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: H
Reviews.Content: It is a great beginner camera, perfect gift for a teenage girl. I bought it for under $80 and couldn't be more satisfied. It is definitely worth the money I money I spent on it. The pics are decent quality. I recommened it for a beginner point and shoot camera or for not so tech savy people out there.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare C613 IS
Reviews.Author: M. Amagna "Suzie_Place"
Reviews.Content: Hillside Strangler: RestrangledThe Kodak Easyshare C613 IS is the best camera in its class.  It takes great color photos and performs well in low light.  All the buttons and prompts are where you want them to be.  The camera powers up and moves fast.  Very rugged and pretty.  Better than the competition and cheaper too!

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA SO FAR
Reviews.Author: myra h. "myra h."
Reviews.Content: SO FAR CAMERA HAS BEEN O.K. HAVE NOT HAD THAT LONG SO DON'T KNOW A LOT ABOUT.  COLOR IS REALLY PRETTY . M.H.

Reviews.Title: I love my camera
Reviews.Author: Valerie Ann Gadson
Reviews.Content: What I like about kodak easy share digital camera is that it takes the best pictures and the pictures come out crystal clear. I like the variety of colors and settings such as audio, video, and favorites. This camera belongs to my daughter.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Sherry
Reviews.Content: Everything was as advertised, and the camera was delivered in excellent condition.  My daughter love it!

Reviews.Title: HAPPY CUSTOMER
Reviews.Author: D. Burge
Reviews.Content: Camera arrived on time and as expected.  IT was a gift to my daughter and she loved it.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk beware- works for 1 month/kodak customer service is terrible
Reviews.Author: lot4my$
Reviews.Content: Only purchase this if you want to purchase a new camera in about 13 months.  Had my kodak camera worked on 2 times for the same thing, now it is still freezing up and kodak won't stand behind their product because it is over the warranty date.  They didn't fix it and now I get to buy a new Samsung or Sony camera.  Kodak supervisor told me it was my problem not his.  good luck if you buy a kodak, you'll need it.

ProductInfo.Name: Kodak EasyShare 6MP C613 Video Zoom Stabilization Digital Camera Pink
